title: Thai Tofu Burritos with Peanut Sauce

Ingredients.1: 1 (16 ounce) package extra firm tofu, drained

Ingredients.11: 1 (8.5 ounce) package coleslaw mix with carrots

Ingredients.17: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Wrap tofu in a paper towel.

Directions.2: Whisk peanut butter and water together in a bowl until smooth. Add 1 tablespoon soy sauce, sugar, cider vinegar, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper; whisk until well mixed.

Directions.3: Combine slaw mix, cilantro, and rice vinegar in a bowl.

Directions.5: Heat olive oil and sesame oil in a skillet over high heat. Add the tofu, remaining 1 tablespoon soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until tofu is browned on all sides, about 10 minutes.

Directions.6: Lay a tortilla on a plate and add 1/6 of the tofu across the middle. Add 1/2 cup of the slaw mix and 2 tablespoons peanut sauce. Wrap tortilla around the fillings, burrito style. Repeat with remaining tortillas and filling.
